solution_line_template: Archie needs ${antibiotic_cost} x {antibiotics_per_day} = $<<{antibiotic_cost}*{antibiotics_per_day}={daily_cost}>>{daily_cost} per day to buy {antibiotics_per_day} antibiotics.
Therefore Archie needs ${daily_cost} x {days_in_week} = $<<{daily_cost}*{days_in_week}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} to buy antibiotics that will last for a week.
